Submodules¶

poc_project.app module¶

Module contents¶

Proof of Concept (PoC) FastAPI Application

This project demonstrates a simple FastAPI application with the following features:

  • Endpoints:

    • Health Check: A basic health check endpoint (/) to verify the application’s status.

    • Personalized Greeting: An endpoint (/{name}) that generates a personalized greeting message based on the provided name.

  • Database Integration:

    • SQLite Database: Utilizes an SQLite database to store request logs.

    • Request Logging: Middleware logs request processing times into the database for monitoring and analysis.

  • Command-Line Interface:

    • Server Execution: A Click-based command-line interface allows running the FastAPI server with configurable port and debug options.

Project Structure

  • `__init__.py`: This file, providing the project overview and documentation.

  • `data/connection.py`: (Assumed) Contains the connect function for establishing the database connection.

  • `models.py`: (Assumed) Defines the RequestLogModel for database logging.

  • Other modules: The project might include additional modules for further functionality or organization.
